lore: The only freshwater-dwelling Piscacanth is the one classified as number 18. They are fast and stealthy, capable of tunneling into the bed of the great Zayte, a huge lake far from Rodia. They can hibernate for long periods of time without feeding. Three months before Sapphire Drake egg-laying season, they hide under the bedrock of this huge lake and emerge when the eggs hatch to devour the young, becoming the main predators of these creatures.
menagerieDialog: I do not wish to speak to you right now. I would prefer to return to where I came from.
You would dare to rip me from my portal and summon me to this dying world? You have no shame.
I am bound to serve you, but know that it is not by choice.
I do not belong here in your filthy Menagerie. I deserve my own quarters in your castle!
Give me freedom, or give me death!
name: Piscacanth
